query: SELECT id, slug, layout_style, JSON_EXTRACT(website_data, '$.designTokens.headlineFont') as headlineFont, JSON_EXTRACT(website_data, '$.designTokens.bodyFont') as bodyFont FROM generated_websites WHERE slug LIKE '%aamaro%' OR slug LIKE '%amaro%' LIMIT 5;
